summary: Diff adds a full React/TanStack Router marketing-site skeleton (layout, header/footer, SEO helper, Home/About/Contact pages partially shown) plus a Motoko backend for lead submissions. Several BuildRequest requirements are either not evidenced in the diff summary (due to omitted/truncated files) or appear only partially implemented. The diff also introduces unrequested Internet Identity/auth/access-control and user-profile functionality.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build the Services page with exactly five service categories and CTAs routing to Contact/Get Started.
missing_requirements.reason: ServicesPage implementation is not shown in the diff summary; cannot verify the five required categories or CTA routing behavior.
evidence: frontend/src/App.tsx (routes to ServicesPage, but page content not shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Build the How It Works page with steps: “Choose Business Type”, “Get Guided Registration”, “Stay Compliant & Scale” in a timeline/numbered layout.
missing_requirements.reason: HowItWorksPage implementation is not shown; cannot verify step headings/order or timeline layout usage.
evidence: frontend/src/components/site/StepsTimeline.tsx (timeline component exists, but page usage not shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Build the Pricing page with Free/Pro/Enterprise plan cards, Pro monthly+yearly options, and a pay-per-service section; each plan has CTA to Contact/Get Started.
missing_requirements.reason: PricingPage implementation is not shown; cannot verify plan cards, Pro monthly/yearly presentation, or pay-per-service section.
evidence: frontend/src/components/site/PricingPlanCard.tsx (component exists, but page usage/structure not shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Build the Resources page with four categories (templates, checklists, guides, knowledge base) and multiple example items per category.
missing_requirements.reason: ResourcesPage implementation is not shown; cannot verify the four required categories and multiple example items.
evidence: frontend/src/components/site/ResourceList.tsx (component exists, but page usage/content not shown)

missing_requirements.requirement: Build the Mentorship & Networking page with sections for mentors, startup community, partner ecosystem, each with CTA to Contact/Get Started.
missing_requirements.reason: MentorshipNetworkingPage implementation is not shown; cannot verify required sections and CTAs.

missing_requirements.requirement: About Us page must include mission text “Empower Saudi entrepreneurs”, mention Vision 2030 alignment, and emphasize local expertise & partnerships.
missing_requirements.reason: Mission text is evidenced, but the diff summary truncates the remainder of AboutPage before showing Vision 2030 and local expertise/partnerships content, so full compliance cannot be verified from provided evidence.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx (truncated; mission text shown, Vision 2030 section starts but is truncated)

missing_requirements.requirement: Contact/Get Started page form collects required full name + email, optional phone + business stage/type, and message; client-side validation with success/error states; WhatsApp and Email contact options as clickable links with configurable WhatsApp link.
missing_requirements.reason: Form fields and success state are partially evidenced, but the diff summary truncates before showing WhatsApp/email links and any explicit client-side validation beyond HTML 'required' attributes; WhatsApp configurability is not evidenced.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend lead capture persists submissions to stable storage with timestamp; query method lists submissions; enforce basic server-side constraints (non-empty name, valid-looking email).
missing_requirements.reason: Backend stores leads in an in-memory Map (`leadsStorage = Map.empty...`) with no stable variable usage shown, so persistence to stable storage is not evidenced. Also `submitLead` shows no server-side validation for non-empty name or valid-looking email (only duplicate-email check).
evidence: backend/main.mo (leadsStorage is a non-stable Map; submitLead lacks name/email validation)

missing_requirements.requirement: Generate and integrate required static visual assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and use them in UI (Home hero + icons).
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage references the expected asset paths, but the diff summary does not show the actual generated image files under `frontend/public/assets/generated` (and notes omitted added files), so asset generation/storage cannot be verified from the provided evidence.
evidence: file-diff summary: "Omitted files due to limits: added=12"

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication provider added and wired into the app (InternetIdentityProvider/useInternetIdentity/useActor).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly says authentication is not required for this build; Internet Identity only if authentication becomes necessary. The diff introduces II regardless.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend access control / admin system with secret-token initialization and admin-only lead queries, plus user profile storage APIs.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for lead capture and a query method to list submissions for admin/dev use; it did not request an access-control framework, secret-token initialization, or user profile features.
evidence: backend/main.mo (imports authorization modules; initializes accessControlState; userProfiles; getCallerUserProfile/saveCallerUserProfile; admin checks)

hallucinated_features.description: Extra backend lead query endpoints (ordered by name, filter by business stage) beyond a basic list-submissions query.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; only a query method to list submissions was required.

hallucinated_features.description: Footer attribution link to caffeine.ai and decorative 'Built with Heart' line.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not part of any requirement (footer branding + disclaimer were required, but this specific attribution is unrequested).
